00013 /************************************************************
00014  * reg_ids.h
00015  *
00016  * Author: Cody Hartwig <chartwig@cs.cmu.edu>
00017  *       Heng Yin <hyin@ece.cmu.edu>
00018  *
00019  * mapping from QEMU constant to register.
00020  */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _REG_IDS_H_
00023 #define _REG_IDS_H_
00024 
00025 #include "../disasm.h"
00026 #include <assert.h>
00027 
00028 #define R_EAX 0
00029 #define R_ECX 1
00030 #define R_EDX 2
00031 #define R_EBX 3
00032 #define R_ESP 4
00033 #define R_EBP 5
00034 #define R_ESI 6
00035 #define R_EDI 7
00036 
00037 #define eip_reg 140
00038 #define cr3_reg 141
00039 #define t0_reg  142
00040 #define t1_reg  143
00041 #define a0_reg  144
00042 
00043 static inline const char *reg_name_from_id(int reg_id)
00044 {
00045   switch(reg_id) {
00046     case es_reg: return "R_ES";
00047     case cs_reg: return "R_CS";
00048     case ss_reg: return "R_SS";
00049     case ds_reg: return "R_DS";
00050     case fs_reg: return "R_FS";
00051     case gs_reg: return "R_GS";
00052 
00053 
00054     case eax_reg: return "R_EAX";
00055     case ecx_reg: return "R_ECX";
00056     case edx_reg: return "R_EDX";
00057     case ebx_reg: return "R_EBX";
00058     case esp_reg: return "R_ESP"; 
00059     case ebp_reg: return "R_EBP";
00060     case esi_reg: return "R_ESI";
00061     case edi_reg: return "R_EDI";
00062     case eip_reg: return "R_EIP";
00063 
00064     case al_reg: return "R_AL";
00065     case cl_reg: return "R_CL";
00066     case dl_reg: return "R_DL";
00067     case bl_reg: return "R_BL";
00068     case ah_reg: return "R_AH"; 
00069     case ch_reg: return "R_CH";
00070     case dh_reg: return "R_DH";
00071     case bh_reg: return "R_BH";
00072     
00073     case ax_reg: return "R_AX";
00074     case cx_reg: return "R_CX";
00075     case dx_reg: return "R_DX";
00076     case bx_reg: return "R_BX";
00077     case sp_reg: return "R_SP"; 
00078     case bp_reg: return "R_BP";
00079     case si_reg: return "R_SI";
00080     case di_reg: return "R_DI";
00081 
00082     default: return NULL;
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00086 static inline void reg_index_from_id(int reg_id, unsigned int *base_id, 
00087   unsigned int *offset, unsigned int *size)
00088 {
00089   switch(reg_id) {
00090     case eax_reg: *base_id = R_EAX, *offset=0, *size=4;
00091       break;
00092     case ecx_reg: *base_id = R_ECX, *offset=0, *size=4;
00093       break;
00094     case edx_reg: *base_id = R_EDX, *offset=0, *size=4;
00095       break;
00096     case ebx_reg: *base_id = R_EBX, *offset=0, *size=4;
00097       break;
00098     case esp_reg: *base_id = R_ESP, *offset=0, *size=4;
00099       break;
00100     case ebp_reg: *base_id = R_EBP, *offset=0, *size=4;
00101       break;
00102     case esi_reg: *base_id = R_ESI, *offset=0, *size=4;
00103       break;
00104     case edi_reg: *base_id = R_EDI, *offset=0, *size=4;
00105       break;
00106 
00107     case al_reg: *base_id = R_EAX, *offset=0, *size=1;
00108          break;
00109     case cl_reg: *base_id = R_ECX, *offset=0, *size=1;
00110          break;
00111     case dl_reg: *base_id = R_EDX, *offset=0, *size=1;
00112          break;
00113     case bl_reg: *base_id = R_EBX, *offset=0, *size=1;
00114          break;
00115     case ah_reg: *base_id = R_EAX, *offset=1, *size=1;
00116          break;
00117     case ch_reg: *base_id = R_ECX, *offset=1, *size=1;
00118          break;
00119     case dh_reg: *base_id = R_EDX, *offset=1, *size=1;
00120          break;
00121     case bh_reg: *base_id = R_EBX, *offset=1, *size=1;
00122          break;
00123        
00124     case ax_reg: *base_id = R_EAX, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00125          break;
00126     case cx_reg: *base_id = R_ECX, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00127          break;
00128     case dx_reg: *base_id = R_EDX, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00129          break;
00130     case bx_reg: *base_id = R_EBX, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00131          break;
00132     case sp_reg: *base_id = R_ESP, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00133          break;
00134     case bp_reg: *base_id = R_EBP, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00135          break;
00136     case si_reg: *base_id = R_ESI, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00137          break;
00138     case di_reg: *base_id = R_EDI, *offset=0, *size=2; 
00139          break;
00140 
00141     case es_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size=2; break;
00142     case cs_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size=2; break;
00143     case ss_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size=2; break;
00144     case ds_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size=2; break;
00145     case fs_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size=2; break;
00146     case gs_reg: *base_id = -1, *offset = 0, *size = 2; break;
00147     default: *base_id = -1;
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00151 static inline int reg_index_to_id(unsigned int base, unsigned int offset, 
00152   unsigned int size)
00153 {
00154   switch (base) {
00155   case R_EAX: 
00156   {
00157     switch(size) {
00158     case 1: if(offset == 0) return al_reg;
00159         else if(offset == 1) return ah_reg;
00160         assert(0);
00161         break;
00162     case 2: if(offset == 0) return ax_reg;
00163         assert(0);
00164         break;
00165     case 4: assert(offset == 0);
00166         return eax_reg;
00167     default:
00168         assert(0);
00169     }
00170     break;
00171   }
00172 
00173   case R_ECX:
00174   {
00175     switch(size) {
00176     case 1: if(offset == 0) return cl_reg;
00177         else if(offset == 1) return ch_reg;
00178         assert(0);
00179         break;
00180     case 2: if(offset == 0) return cx_reg;
00181         assert(0);
00182         break;
00183     case 4: assert(offset == 0);
00184         return ecx_reg;
00185     default:
00186         assert(0);
00187     }
00188     break;
00189   }
00190  
00191   case R_EDX:
00192     {
00193     switch(size) {
00194     case 1: if(offset == 0) return dl_reg;
00195         else if(offset == 1) return dh_reg;
00196         assert(0);
00197         break;
00198     case 2: if(offset == 0) return dx_reg;
00199         assert(0);
00200         break;
00201     case 4: assert(offset == 0);
00202         return edx_reg;
00203     default:
00204         assert(0);
00205     }
00206     break;
00207   }
00208 
00209   case R_EBX:
00210   {
00211     switch(size) {
00212     case 1: if(offset == 0) return bl_reg;
00213         else if(offset == 1) return bh_reg;
00214         assert(0);
00215         break;
00216     case 2: if(offset == 0) return bx_reg;
00217         assert(0);
00218         break;
00219     case 4: assert(offset == 0);
00220         return ebx_reg;
00221     default:
00222         assert(0);
00223     }
00224     break;
00225   }
00226  
00227   case R_EBP:
00228   {
00229     assert(offset == 0);
00230     if(size == 2) return bp_reg;
00231     else if(size == 4) return ebp_reg;
00232     assert(0);
00233     break;
00234   }
00235   
00236   case R_ESP:
00237     {
00238     assert(offset == 0);
00239     if(size == 2) return sp_reg;
00240     else if(size == 4) return esp_reg;
00241     assert(0);
00242     break;
00243   }
00244 
00245   case R_EDI:
00246   {
00247     assert(offset == 0);
00248     if(size == 2) return di_reg;
00249     else if(size == 4) return edi_reg;
00250     assert(0);
00251     break;
00252   }
00253  
00254   case R_ESI:
00255   {
00256     assert(offset == 0);
00257     if(size == 2) return si_reg;
00258     else if(size == 4) return esi_reg;
00259     assert(0);
00260     break;
00261   }
00262  
00263   default: 
00264     assert(0);
00265   }
00266   assert(0);
00267   return 0;
00268 }
00269 
00270 #endif
